member_organisations:
FTA has over 16,000 members from all parts of the logistics sector, from operators to shippers. 
FTA members operate more than 200,000 lorries - almost half the UK fleet. In addition, our members deliver over 90 per cent of freight moved by rail; and 70 per cent of UK visible exports by sea and air. 
http://www.fta.co.uk/about/
fields_of_interest: Budget, Trade, Competition, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
- Revision of Driver Training Directive 
- Mobility Package (Access to the market and to the profession, Revision of Eurovignette & EETS, Drivers' Hours & Posting of drivers)   
- MRV in Maritime Emissions 
- Revision of the Combined Transport Directive 
- Rail Freight Corridors 
- Implementation of the Low-Carbon Mobility Strategy 
- CO2 standards for vans & trucks 
- ETS   
- CEF mid-term review 
- TEN-T 
- Brexit
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Tachograph Forum#E03379#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3379#Member#C#Focal Points and Short Sea Promotion Centres for Shortsea Shipping and Motorways of the Sea#E01080#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1080#Member#C
goals__remit: The Freight Transport Association represents the transport needs of UK industry. Its membership is comprised of manufacturers, retailers, logistic companies, operators (rail & road) and organisations in the public and private sector. The Association’s transport interests are multimodal and in addition to consigning over 90 per cent of freight carried on rail and over 70 per cent of sea and air freight its members operate in excess of 200 000 goods vehicles, approximately half the UK fleet.
